fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Weave a dead body into existence: they are revived, but will die 2 phases later. (2 uses)
- Control a dead body into another player.
- Make a contract with another player: they are bound by the contract till the end of the game. You decide the terms, they must agree. If they break it, they are modkilled. If they allude to being in a contract or say they are in a contract: they are modkilled. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may offer and gain things from contracts, so long as the host agrees.
- If killed, you will go to the realm of the dead. Once 5 people after you are killed, you will absorb there essence and revive.(1 use)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose the game.
